name: Simple Space Game (SPRProgramming)
description:
Enjoy this simple space game where you fight another ships in space.  Enjoy the different enemies and power ups, that will change how the game goes. 

Get the best score and upload it to the online scoreboard in the game.

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Left Mouse Click - shoot
  • ESC - Pause Menu

All 2D art is from: https://kenney.nl/assets
